title: The lane is saved!
body:
https://i.redd.it/3tqhnc0r46t21.jpg

###### Meme from [this post](https://www.reddit.com/r/LeagueOfMemes/comments/bew6ix/whippity_whoppity_laners_are_property/) on Reddit by u/expartex

replies.body:
Alternatively:

Shows up long after you die so you get no assist, then push the lane in front of the enemy tower so you cant even farm

ill do you one better.
comes to gank lane and the enemy gets away, taxes you anyways.
Comes to gank lane, you die because they somehow miss their point and click, the enemy gets away, then they attempt to take the wave but only manage to get one caster out of two waves.
Nah, what you do is you proxy farm 3 waves to allow your laner to dive solo while you go get gromp
Uhhh that's normal.  If the jungler ganked even with no kill they used their time, they should get a minion or two.
Bonus points if they flame you for pushing so they can't gank cx

> [{quoted}](name=GodlyBane,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WGEFRxAl,comment-id=00000003,timestamp=2019-04-20T05:07:46.528+0000)
>
> thats a lot of low elo upvotes. If your jungle pushes your lane when you, and the enemy just got out of lane, that is good. that means although you lose xp, the enemy laner does too, and this not only puts enemy a little behind, but actually helps your jungler get exp and catch up in levels (because the jungle is more unviable then the left sock you left in your shelf for the past 2 years due to the exp nerfs)

Memes & Games

You diva

Sometimes the laner is just being toxic and blaming the jungler for their own failures.

But sometimes, junglers really do be like that. Don't give an assist, tax the wave and push to the enemy tower, and then flame you for pushing or falling behind in CS lol

> [{quoted}](name=Jimmy Rustles,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WGEFRxAl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-04-19T17:03:52.304+0000)
>
> Alternatively:
> 
> Shows up long after you die so you get no assist, then push the lane in front of the enemy tower so you cant even farm

but if he pushes the wave into the tower... unless you're already almost at lane... that's what he's supposed to do consdering it'll reset the lane and it's just optimal for exp and gold. It also makes the enemy team lose gold and exp considering the guy on the other team is dead. I honestly have no idea why you have so many upvotes for pointing out a strategy that's supposed to be used. Do you think people do that in pro play to tilt their teammates? I literally ping my jungler to push waves in for me because people like you flame them for it, so they're scared to do it, despite it being the most optimal thing for both me and the jungler.

> [{quoted}](name=The Trent,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WGEFRxAl,comment-id=00000005,timestamp=2019-04-21T07:19:40.077+0000)
>
> but if he pushes the wave into the tower... unless you're already almost at lane... that's what he's supposed to do consdering it'll reset the lane and it's just optimal for exp and gold. It also makes the enemy team lose gold and exp considering the guy on the other team is dead. I honestly have no idea why you have so many upvotes for pointing out a strategy that's supposed to be used. Do you think people do that in pro play to tilt their teammates? I literally ping my jungler to push waves in for me because people like you flame them for it, so they're scared to do it, despite it being the most optimal thing for both me and the jungler.



Yet again

Memes & Games

You diva
My favorite recently: Zac jumps into lane, I engage a fight, Zac farms my minions while enemy later kills me.

If I'm laning and my jungler comes and we kill my enemy laner I usually want jungler to stay and help me push my lane into their tower so the tower kills my minions and resets the wave and I get a free back and an experience advantage on my lane opponent. I usually don't give a crap if I get the gold or not, I just got an assist and experience advantage is infinitely more important.

That's how it should be but most junglers aren't smart, minion wave is perfectly balanced in the center while you're dead or you backed, your jungler comes pushes it towards the enemy tower, the enemy safely freezes it because your jungler made it easy for him, the enemy gains a level over you thanks to your jungler.

My friend did this and after it was pushed and I got zoned...

"Come on man I gave you a lead. How did you lose?"

But because he is a friend, I just tolerated it and said "Idk man sorry"

Every. Time.
pushing wave and maybe even getting turret plate =/= taxing.

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WGEFRxAl,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-04-19T16:28:09.268+0000)
>
> https://i.redd.it/3tqhnc0r46t21.jpg
> 
> ###### Meme from [this post](https://www.reddit.com/r/LeagueOfMemes/comments/bew6ix/whippity_whoppity_laners_are_property/) on Reddit by u/expartex

Depending on the jungler this just might be the best course of action. Lee Sin, Kindred, Vi, Hecarim, and more can all snowball off a bit of early gold and experience. Then as they become super strong they can gank even better.

So sure you can be "cheeky" (and wrong) by posting this picture, but in all seriousness it sounds like your not very thankful to your jungler. Sure there are some bad junglers, but our entire job is to deal with 3 lanes and baby sit them all, while baby sitting all four quadrants of jungle, dragon pit, and herald pit. We have to play the biggest macro game of all. so while you concentrate on about 15% of the rift, we have to deal with 100% of it.

> [{quoted}](name=StonePlatypus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=WGEFRxAl,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-04-20T02:12:44.046+0000)
>
> Depending on the jungler this just might be the best course of action. Lee Sin, Kindred, Vi, Hecarim, and more can all snowball off a bit of early gold and experience. Then as they become super strong they can gank even better.
> 
> So sure you can be "cheeky" (and wrong) by posting this picture, but in all seriousness it sounds like your not very thankful to your jungler. Sure there are some bad junglers, but our entire job is to deal with 3 lanes and baby sit them all, while baby sitting all four quadrants of jungle, dragon pit, and herald pit. We have to play the biggest macro game of all. so while you concentrate on about 15% of the rift, we have to deal with 100% of it.

Snowballing as any of those you mentioned is not happening against a fed Renekton or Darius or Tryndamere, however. Weak top lane = your team has no front line, better hope your bot lane picked something like a Galio/Thresh/Alistair and that said bot lane won their lane.
